title: Air-Side Nusselt Numbers and Friction Factor’s Individual Correlations for Four-Row Plate‑Fin‑and‑Tube Heat Exchangers
abstract: Paper derives row‑wise correlations for air‑side Nusselt number and friction factor for four‑row PFHEs using validated CFD. The models are calibrated on detailed flow/heat‑transfer fields and tested against measurements to quantify accuracy across Reynolds ranges relevant to HVAC applications.

title: Comparison of Individual Air‑Side Row‑By‑Row Heat Transfer Coefficient Correlations on Four‑Row Finned‑Tube Heat Exchangers
abstract: Study compares alternative row‑by‑row correlations for air‑side heat‑transfer coefficients in a 4‑row finned‑tube HEX. Using CFD and experimental references, the paper quantifies differences between candidate relations and their influence on predicted performance.

title: New Calculation Method for Tube Cross‑Flow Heat Exchangers
abstract: Proposes an analytical‑numerical method for thermal calculations of cross‑flow tube heat exchangers; the approach couples energy balances with compact correlations to improve prediction of outlet temperatures and ε‑NTU‑based metrics.

title: Calculating the Efficiency of Complex‑Shaped Fins
journal: Cracow University of Technology – CRIS record
abstract: Discusses practical evaluation of fin efficiency for non‑standard fin geometries in finned‑tube exchangers; presents closed‑form approximations validated against numerical solutions.

title: Numerical Modelling of Steam Superheaters in Supercritical Boilers
abstract: Builds a numerical model of a four‑pass supercritical steam superheater with complex flow distribution; accounts for temperature‑dependent thermophysical properties to predict metal temperatures and pressure drops.

title: Modelling of High‑Temperature Tube Heat Exchangers Operating at Variable Conditions
abstract: Analytical‑numerical framework for thermal behaviour of high‑temperature tubular heat exchangers under varying boundary conditions; benchmarked against plant‑scale data.

title: Performance Calculations of the Steam Reheater in a Large Power Boiler Using a Numerical–Analytical Method
abstract: Hybrid numerical–analytical approach to evaluate thermal‑hydraulic performance of a boiler steam reheater; provides engineering correlations and validation on operational data.
